name: GOLD ROAD TO UNDERGO REPAIRS
text:
GOLD ROAD TO UNDERGO REPAIRS

Fort Heath sources confirmed that repairs will be made to the Gold Road between Anvil and Kvatch over the coming months. Legion-supervised crews will be deployed to locations most in need of repair and tasked with filling potholes, replacing missing paving stones, and digging new drainage ditches where necessary.

Travelers are asked to give repair crews space and not to interfere with the execution of their duties. Alternative routes may be temporarily advised.
